snippet.title: The Black Pepper Crew - Release Announcement
snippet.description:
The Black Pepper Crew is coming to Steam on July 24, 2023! Download the demo on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1605520/The_Black_Pepper_Crew/
 
Assemble your crew, gear them up and fight creatively on this easy to learn but hard to master turn-based tactical roguelite. Capture the most dangerous bounties in the city, cash that juicy bounty and improve your chances of survival on a city filled with crime and jazzy grooves. 
 
Developed by Quijipixel Games.

Join the Discord: https://discord.gg/mSF6bCc
Follow Wildfrost on Twitter: https://twitter.com/QuijiPixel
